name: Golem Odyssey
description:
In this 2D top-down view rogue-like, incarnate a fallen meteor transformed into a golem and collect Tarot cards that grants you extra abilities to progress through each wave of enemies. Choose between either the Sun-powered or the Moon-powered cards each granting an unique ability.
